main.name: Wendy Grant
main.description: who has a passion for the complexity of story telling in the form of UX/UI design
main.bio: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer and engineer who can merge analytical skills with creativity to deliver a client-centric product. Has a strong passion for humanizing technology and creating impactful solutions, focusing on inclusive designs. Excels at communicating and has a reputation for having an infectious personality that motivates and drives morale in high pressure situations.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions or just want to share a comment, drop me a line.

testimonials.text: Very polished user interface! Very smooth. Good job on providing a list of options and values for user to select. I was able to add department/role/employees with no problem, without the seed data too! Very well documented readme. Overall, excellent job! Keep it up!
Absolutely wonderful job with the project. Solid code, solid commit history, solid walkthrough, you should be proud.
testimonials.user: Christian Henry - UT Boot Camp TA

testimonials.text: Excellent job on the assignment, Wendy! Your demo was awesome! Your code was very clean and well structured, keep this up in future projects. Great effort, keep it up!
Great job on this assignment. It functions perfectly and the repository looks really professional.
testimonials.user: Hunter Wilkins - UT Boot Camp TA
